contents.text: Welcome to Amplitude Analytics, empowering your business with actionable product insights for the digital era.
For sales inquiries and product demos, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo with our team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for a product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Connect me with a specialist to schedule a personalized product demo right away.
Schedule a personalized demo to see how Amplitude can track user engagement in my veteran services platform.
I need to schedule a live walkthrough of Amplitude’s feature set and API instrumentation with a sales engineer.
I’d like a one-on-one walkthrough of the product’s features.
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how Amplitude can help analyze my experimental data.

contents.text: For detailed pricing information and plan options, press 2.
Please hold for pricing details. A sales representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and plan options to finalize our budget.
Get detailed pricing and plan options, including any veteran or nonprofit discounts, for Amplitude Analytics.
I want a detailed breakdown of pricing tiers, seat licensing costs, overage fees, and custom enterprise packages.
I need clear information on subscription plans and costs.
I need pricing details and student plan options for university research use.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
For help with integration, setup, and onboarding, press 1.
One moment please. We’re connecting you to our integration specialists.

navigationGoals: Speak with an integration expert to set up Amplitude’s SDK in our app.
Connect with integration specialists to onboard and integrate Amplitude into my app’s architecture.
I need help configuring the JavaScript SDK integration and setting up my event-tracking pipelines.
I need help setting up and integrating the software.
I need assistance integrating Amplitude into my data analysis pipeline.

contents.text: For account management, billing, or subscription questions, press 2.
Please hold for our account management team. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: Clarify a billing discrepancy and update our subscription plan.
Speak with account management to update my billing details and review my subscription plan.
I’d like to update my subscription plan, adjust seat counts, and clarify my latest invoice charges.
I need assistance with my account details, like billing or subscription changes.
I want to update my subscription billing information and check my invoice.
